name: Sarah Johnson
message: I absolutely love your app! The ability to sync shopping lists with my family is amazing. However, I've noticed that notifications are sometimes delayed. Could you fix this issue?

name: Michael Thompson
message: The category organization feature is super helpful! Would it be possible to add a price comparison feature? That way I could see which store has the best deals before heading out.

name: Emily Davis
message: I'm using the app with my mom, and she's having trouble seeing some of the buttons. Could you make the interface more senior-friendly with larger text and buttons?

name: David Wilson
message: Would you consider adding a PDF export feature for shopping lists? It would be great to have a printed copy when I go to the store. Also, a barcode scanner would be really useful!

name: Jennifer Martinez
message: I'm using the app with my roommates in our college dorm. It would be awesome if you could add a feature to split expenses for shared shopping lists. This would make our grocery shopping much easier!
